name: Zomedica Pharmaceuticals Corp.
description: Zomedica Pharmaceuticals Corp. is a veterinary health company focused on developing diagnostic and therapeutic products for companion animals. Founded in 2015 and headquartered in Ann Arbor, Michigan, Zomedica aims to address the significant unmet needs in the veterinary market, particularly through innovative solutions that enhance the quality of care for pets. The company's flagship product, TRUFORMA, is a point-of-care diagnostic platform designed to provide accurate and timely testing for various conditions, enabling veterinarians to make better-informed decisions for their patients. Zomedica’s mission is to create products that improve the health and well-being of pets while also increasing the efficiency of veterinary practices. By leveraging advanced technology and scientific expertise, Zomedica is committed to delivering innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of veterinary professionals and pet owners alike. The company is also actively engaged in research and development, exploring additional product offerings and enhancing its existing portfolio to ensure it remains at the forefront of veterinary medicine.
